question: What is the USSD code for Query Service on Aadhaar Mapper (QSAM)?
explanation: QSAM (Query Service on Aadhaar Mapper) service helps user in knowing their Aadhaar Seeding status with their bank account. This service provided by NPCI can be availed by dialling *99*99#. With this, the user can know whether his/her AADHAAR number is seeded/linked to any bank account number or not. If yes, then with which bank and when it was last updated.
